body:
Fellow Renderers,


This is my offer and proposal for a Radiance wiki:


With your collective approval, and if enough Radiance users pledge to 
contribute to a Radiance wiki (i.e., coauthor, manage, and/or otherwise 
create, edit, and maintain pages and entries), I will offer my services 
to register a domain name, pay for the hosting, and setup the wiki server.


(Also, I would be content if someone or everyone would prefer to appoint 
someone other than myself for such an initiative.)


Sincerely,
Chris
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2014-February/010014.html).</sup>
